verses.name: Genesis 2:11
verses.text: The name of the first is Pison: that is it which compasseth the whole land of Havilah, where there is gold;

verses.name: Genesis 2:12
verses.text: And the gold of that land is good: there is bdellium and the onyx stone.

verses.name: Genesis 2:13
verses.text: And the name of the second river is Gihon: the same is it that compasseth the whole land of Ethiopia.

verses.name: Genesis 2:14
verses.text: And the name of the third river is Hiddekel: that is it which goeth toward the east of Assyria. And the fourth river is Euphrates.
